text: George Timothy Hudson 'The Story of Lord Tim Hudson", LordTim.com . Retrieved January 13, 2020 (11 February 1940 â€“ 14 December 2019), known as Lord Tim Hudson, was an English DJ and voice actor. He worked in Los Angeles for KFWB during the mid 1960s and was the manager of The Seeds and The Lollipop Shoppe. He was a sports manager, notably of the cricketer Ian Botham. He voiced characters in the animated Disney movies The Jungle Book and The Aristocats. He was born in Prestbury, Cheshire, England. Hudson died on 14 December 2019. ==References== ==Other websites== *Hudson on Voice Chasers website *Hudson on the Internet Movie Database *Hudson andThe Beatles *Hudson and 'Hudson's Hollywood XI *Hudson's official website Category:1940 births Category:2019 deaths Category:English voice actors Category:English movie actors Category:British DJs Category:Actors from Cheshire Category:Writers from Cheshire Category:Musicians from Cheshire
title: Lord Tim Hudson
